languages.text: "Going into such a battle without first warming one's blood with suffering and pain could be perilous. And this time, the feast must be far more lavish than any before it. A bloody march across the ship, no less. I beseech you..." {n}Marazhai strives to keep his voice deferential, but he is almost trembling with anticipation.{/n} "Give the orders to your servants. Prepare all that is required. And... allow me to accompany you."
languages.original_text: "Идти в такой бой, не разогрев свою кровь страданиями и болью, чревато. И в этот раз пиршество должно быть куда богаче, чем те, что были раньше. Кровавый марш через весь корабль, не меньше. Я прошу тебя..." {n}Маражай старается сохранять голос почтительным, хотя друкари едва не дрожит от предвкушения.{/n} "Отдай приказы своим слугам. Приготовь все, что потребуется. И... дозволь сопровождать тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Going into such a battle without first warming one's blood with suffering and pain could be perilous. And this time, the feast must be far more lavish than any before it. A bloody march across the ship, no less. I beseech you..." {n}Marazhai strives to keep his voice deferential, but he is almost trembling with anticipation.{/n} "Give the orders to your servants. Prepare all that is required. And... allow me to accompany you."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Идти в такой бой, не разогрев свою кровь страданиями и болью, чревато. И в этот раз пиршество должно быть куда богаче, чем те, что были раньше. Кровавый марш через весь корабль, не меньше. Я прошу тебя..." {n}Маражай старается сохранять голос почтительным, хотя друкари едва не дрожит от предвкушения.{/n} "Отдай приказы своим слугам. Приготовь все, что потребуется. И... дозволь сопровождать тебя".
“如果不先通过痛苦与折磨温暖我们的血液，贸然投入这样的战斗会极其危险。这场盛宴必须比之前那些盛宴更加丰盛，这必须是一场跨越整艘飞船的血腥游行。我请求你……”{n}玛拉斋努力保持着恭敬态度，但他的声音早已兴奋得颤抖起来。{/n}“吩咐你的仆人准备一切必需之物，并且……允许我与你同行。”
languages.original_text: "Going into such a battle without first warming one's blood with suffering and pain could be perilous. And this time, the feast must be far more lavish than any before it. A bloody march across the ship, no less. I beseech you..." {n}Marazhai strives to keep his voice deferential, but he is almost trembling with anticipation.{/n} "Give the orders to your servants. Prepare all that is required. And... allow me to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: “如果不先通过痛苦与折磨温暖我们的血液，贸然投入这样的战斗会极其危险。这场盛宴必须比之前那些盛宴更加丰盛，这必须是一场跨越整艘飞船的血腥游行。我请求你……”{n}玛拉斋努力保持着恭敬态度，但他的声音早已兴奋得颤抖起来。{/n}“吩咐你的仆人准备一切必需之物，并且……允许我与你同行。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Entrar en combate sin calentarse la sangre a base de dolor y sufrimiento puede ser peligroso. Y esta vez el festín ha de ser mucho más opulento que ningún otro. Nada menos que un cruento desfile por toda la nave. Te lo imploro...». {n}Marazhai se afana por hablarte con un tono respetuoso, pero su voz tiembla de la expectación.{/n} «Imparte las órdenes a tus sirvientes. Prepara todo lo que sea menester. Y... permíteme acompañarte».
languages.original_text: "Going into such a battle without first warming one's blood with suffering and pain could be perilous. And this time, the feast must be far more lavish than any before it. A bloody march across the ship, no less. I beseech you..." {n}Marazhai strives to keep his voice deferential, but he is almost trembling with anticipation.{/n} "Give the orders to your servants. Prepare all that is required. And... allow me to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: «Entrar en combate sin calentarse la sangre a base de dolor y sufrimiento puede ser peligroso. Y esta vez el festín ha de ser mucho más opulento que ningún otro. Nada menos que un cruento desfile por toda la nave. Te lo imploro...». {n}Marazhai se afana por hablarte con un tono respetuoso, pero su voz tiembla de la expectación.{/n} «Imparte las órdenes a tus sirvientes. Prepara todo lo que sea menester. Y... permíteme acompañarte».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Se lancer dans la bataille sans un échauffement préalable me semble bien périlleux. Et cette fois-ci, c'est à un véritable festin de douleur et de souffrance que nous devrions nous livrer avant de combattre. Une marche sanglante à travers le vaisseau. Je vous en conjure... » {n}Marazhai s'efforce de s'adresser à vous avec déférence, mais tremble presque d'excitation.{/n} « Donnez l'ordre à vos serviteurs d'effectuer tous les préparatifs nécessaires. Et... permettez-moi de vous accompagner. »
languages.original_text: "Going into such a battle without first warming one's blood with suffering and pain could be perilous. And this time, the feast must be far more lavish than any before it. A bloody march across the ship, no less. I beseech you..." {n}Marazhai strives to keep his voice deferential, but he is almost trembling with anticipation.{/n} "Give the orders to your servants. Prepare all that is required. And... allow me to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: « Se lancer dans la bataille sans un échauffement préalable me semble bien périlleux. Et cette fois-ci, c'est à un véritable festin de douleur et de souffrance que nous devrions nous livrer avant de combattre. Une marche sanglante à travers le vaisseau. Je vous en conjure... » {n}Marazhai s'efforce de s'adresser à vous avec déférence, mais tremble presque d'excitation.{/n} « Donnez l'ordre à vos serviteurs d'effectuer tous les préparatifs nécessaires. Et... permettez-moi de vous accompagner. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Es könnte sich als gefährlich erweisen, in eine solche Schlacht zu ziehen, ohne davor Euer Blut mit Schmerz und Leid in Wallung zu bringen. Und dieses Mal muss das Fest noch wesentlich üppiger ausfallen als alle anderen zuvor. Ich spreche von einem blutigen Marsch durchs ganze Schiff. Ich flehe Euch an ..." {n}Marazhai müht sich, respektvoll zu klingen, aber er zittert fast voller Vorfreude.{/n} "Erteilt Euren Dienern den Befehl. Bereitet alles vor, was erforderlich ist. Und ... gestattet mir, Euch zu begleiten."
languages.original_text: "Going into such a battle without first warming one's blood with suffering and pain could be perilous. And this time, the feast must be far more lavish than any before it. A bloody march across the ship, no less. I beseech you..." {n}Marazhai strives to keep his voice deferential, but he is almost trembling with anticipation.{/n} "Give the orders to your servants. Prepare all that is required. And... allow me to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: "Es könnte sich als gefährlich erweisen, in eine solche Schlacht zu ziehen, ohne davor Euer Blut mit Schmerz und Leid in Wallung zu bringen. Und dieses Mal muss das Fest noch wesentlich üppiger ausfallen als alle anderen zuvor. Ich spreche von einem blutigen Marsch durchs ganze Schiff. Ich flehe Euch an ..." {n}Marazhai müht sich, respektvoll zu klingen, aber er zittert fast voller Vorfreude.{/n} "Erteilt Euren Dienern den Befehl. Bereitet alles vor, was erforderlich ist. Und ... gestattet mir, Euch zu begleiten."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「苦しみと痛みで血を温めずにこういう戦いに臨むのは危険だ。それに今回は、これまでのどの戦いよりも遥かに豪華な宴になるに違いないだろう。血みどろの行進が船内を縦横無尽に駆け巡るってわけだ。頼むぜ…」{n}マラズハイは努めて丁寧な言葉を使おうとしてはいるものの、その声音は期待に震えている。{/n}「従者たちに命令を下すんだ。必要なものをすべて準備しろ。そして…俺も同行させてくれ」
languages.original_text: "Going into such a battle without first warming one's blood with suffering and pain could be perilous. And this time, the feast must be far more lavish than any before it. A bloody march across the ship, no less. I beseech you..." {n}Marazhai strives to keep his voice deferential, but he is almost trembling with anticipation.{/n} "Give the orders to your servants. Prepare all that is required. And... allow me to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: 「苦しみと痛みで血を温めずにこういう戦いに臨むのは危険だ。それに今回は、これまでのどの戦いよりも遥かに豪華な宴になるに違いないだろう。血みどろの行進が船内を縦横無尽に駆け巡るってわけだ。頼むぜ…」{n}マラズハイは努めて丁寧な言葉を使おうとしてはいるものの、その声音は期待に震えている。{/n}「従者たちに命令を下すんだ。必要なものをすべて準備しろ。そして…俺も同行させてくれ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Izdırap ve acıyla kanını doyurmadan böylesi bir savaşa girmek çok tehlikeli olabilir. Bu seferki, şu ana kadar yaptıklarımız arasında en savurgan ziyafet olmalı. Gemide baştan aşağı kana bulanmış bir yolculuğa çıkacağız. Rica ediyorum..." {n}Marazhai, sesini itaatkâr bir tonda tutmaya çalışsa da beklenti heyecanıyla sesi titriyormuş gibi anlaşılıyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârlarına emirlerini ver. Gereken her şeyi hazırla. Ayrıca... Sana eşlik etmeme izin ver."
languages.original_text: "Going into such a battle without first warming one's blood with suffering and pain could be perilous. And this time, the feast must be far more lavish than any before it. A bloody march across the ship, no less. I beseech you..." {n}Marazhai strives to keep his voice deferential, but he is almost trembling with anticipation.{/n} "Give the orders to your servants. Prepare all that is required. And... allow me to accompany you."

traits.locale_text: "Izdırap ve acıyla kanını doyurmadan böylesi bir savaşa girmek çok tehlikeli olabilir. Bu seferki, şu ana kadar yaptıklarımız arasında en savurgan ziyafet olmalı. Gemide baştan aşağı kana bulanmış bir yolculuğa çıkacağız. Rica ediyorum..." {n}Marazhai, sesini itaatkâr bir tonda tutmaya çalışsa da sesi kulağa beklenti heyecanıyla titriyor gibi geliyor.{/n} "Hizmetkârlarına emirlerini ver. Gereken her şeyi hazırla. Ayrıca... Sana eşlik etmeme izin ver."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
